description: Variation of condition 1 of planning permission dated 25th September 2024 (RN:24/00448/FULL) for the Extension to the rear closet wing of No 43, extension of the lift over-run to the 4th floor, repositioning of windows and demolition of semi-circular and rectangular extensions at ground floor level and alterations to the fenestration. Infill extension of ground floor courtyard area to be used in association with the existing residential (Class C3). Creation of a ground floor light well serving a repositioned window in 43 Clarges Mews. [SITE INCLUDES NO. 42 CHARLES STREET AND NOS. 42 AND 43 CLARGES MEWS]. Namely, to allow for amendments including amendments to the windows to the approved closet wing, new roof access, raised boundary wall with No. 44 Charles Street, new safety railings, an additional rooflight and re-sizing of another and slight increase in the height of the lift.
decision_conditions: +1 Design ext appearance OK in CA
